text: kya ye log keval isee kee prateeksha kar rahe hai ki unake paas farishte aa jaen ya svayan tumhaara rab kee koee nishaanee aa jaegee, phir kisee aise vyakti ko usaka eemaan kuchh laabh na pahunchaega jo pahale eemaan na laaya ho ya jisane apane eemaan mein koee bhalaee na kamaee ho. kah do, ?"tum bhee prateeksha karo, ham bhee prateeksha karate hai.
